name: node-zanarkand-ffxiv
description: A wrapper for acchan's Zanarkand network capture library.

scripts.unfirewall7: netsh advfirewall firewall add rule name="ZanarkandWrapperJSON" dir=in action=allow program=./ZanarkandWrapper/ZanarkandWrapper.exe enable=yes
scripts.unfirewallXP: netsh firewall set allowedprogram ./ZanarkandWrapper/ZanarkandWrapper.exe ZanarkandWrapperJSON ENABLE

author: karashiiro
